displaySolutionDescription: Task is updated to contain the solution.
a11yClickableTextLabel: Full text where words can be marked
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
taskDescription: Mark keywords related to how to get more parallel data for NMT systems: (hint: mark 1 word per sentence!)
textField:
- "This parallel corpus is made of *web-crawled* content from multilingual websites."

- "We enhanced our French-to-English NMT systems by getting automatically *back-translated* text from English into French." 

- "We didn’t have enough English-Croatian parallel data, but had an English-Slovene system and also an Slovene-Croatian one, so we *pivoted* through Slovene to make a synthetic extra corpus."

- "We’ve replaced all nouns in the source and target side of the corpus with synonyms in order to get *augmented* parallel data."
